DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Put this card into your hand from your draw- or discard pile. If doesn't exist or is exhausted, create a new card in your hand instead.
Resource for some cards. Attacks consume up to 6 Charge and increase their damage by the number consumed.
If Banish reaches 10 or more, remove it and deal 50 damage.
Reduces the damage of the target's attacks until the end of turn whenever they receive unblocked attack damage.
Benefits from all stacks of Charge without consuming them.
Stacks of Charge used by this card are not consumed.
Increases the threshold of Banish until the end of turn.
